name: Escape from Arcadia (Cory Marleau)
description:
A lost soul in the underworld finds themselves surrounded by mysterious puzzles. A chessboard, unlit candles, and a godly clue hold the key to escape. Can you solve the riddles? 

Navigate through a 3D environment modelled and textured by Cory Marleau, and created by a team of University of Portland students. Developed over the course of a few weeks, this project showcases Godot engine's 3D capabilities to recreate the atmosphere of an ancient civilization, complete with interactive lighting, immersive sound, and dynamic physics. Will you enter the Temple of Arcadia?
